# MonotoneEI

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

MonotoneEI implements the methods in Elzayn et al., 2025.

## Installation

You can install the development version of MonotoneEI from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("reglab/MonotoneEI")
```
